snippet.title: Dragon's Dogma II Full Presentation | Capcom Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
After showing off the most recent trailer, Dragon's Dogma II director Hideaki Itsuno discussed the action/roleplaying elements in the long awaited follow up to 2012's Dragon's Dogma. Built on Capcom's RE engine, the game boasts a world 4x bigger than the original Dragon's Dogma and offers a variety of combat styles including swords and magic. AI controlled Pawns play a key role in making the single player experience feel like co-op. Dragon's Dogman II will be released for PS5, Xbox X/S, Steam at a later date.

#dragonsdogma2 #capcom #gaming
